title: RequestBody
description: This document describes the details of the request body for tenant creation

annotations.description: The kubernetes annotations to add to the ArgoCD tenant application

janitor/ttl.description: The TTL value to auto-clean the tenant with janitor for pull-requests

dnsCloudDomain.description: The DNS zone for the tenant

disk_size.description: The MySQL disk size in GB

snapshot_ref.description: The MySQL snapshot url to use

pim.description: The PIM configuration for the tenant

login.description: The login for PIM admin user

firstName.description: The firstname of the PIM admin user

lastName.description: The lastname of the PIM admin user

email.description: The email of the PIM admin user

uiLocale.description: The ui locale of the PIM admin user

tshirt_size.description: The t-shirt size for the tenant
